Changelog
=========

1.1.2 (2026-01-21)
------------------

- Removed trailing slashes from URIs
  Refs. https://github.com/syslabcom/scrum/issues/4181

- Removed obsolete chart
  Refs. https://github.com/syslabcom/scrum/issues/4389

1.1.1 (2025-12-09)
------------------

- Added tools to Live performance
  Refs. https://github.com/syslabcom/scrum/issues/4181


1.1.0 (2025-04-01)
------------------

- Custom “Learned about OiRA” display for France
  https://github.com/syslabcom/scrum/issues/2375
- New sector: Agriculture
  https://github.com/syslabcom/scrum/issues/3312


1.0.0 (2024-06-13)
------------------

* Initial release
